lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Effective today, the company said, it is adopting new business practices to remain responsive to the needs of customers and the rapidly changing marketplace, specifically the trend towards distributed, networked operations.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Based on the analysis of product mix, price adjustments will generally result in minimal net impact in costs in a typical user enterprise," it added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Digital Equipment said it is taking several initiatives designed to make it easier and more cost effecive for customers to purchase and use its products and services.
